plot: The pension is full of young, smiling women, under a severe no-men-admittance rule imposed by the strict female manager. One day, a man enters under disguise, and the whole life-style is disrupted.
title: La casa de las sonrisas
plot_es: The pension is full of young, smiling women, under a severe no-men-admittance rule imposed by the strict female manager. One day, a man enters under disguise, and the whole life-style is disrupted.
plot_en: The pension is full of young, smiling women, under a severe no-men-admittance rule imposed by the strict female manager. One day, a man enters under disguise, and the whole life-style is disrupted.
